application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: Reason : 1 - Insufficient details have been submitted to demonstrate the works would be carried out at suitable levels in relation to the highway and adjoining properties. Therefore the proposal would fail to accord with Policy DM1 of the Councils Development Management Policies Local Plan 2013.

Reason : 2 - The proposal fails to demonstrate the details submitted in relation to the disposal of surface water would provide adequate drainage facilities which would reduce and mitigate the effects of flood risk. Therefore, the proposal would not in accordance with Policies SI 5, SI 8, SI 12, SI 13 of the London Plan (2021), Policy CS1 U of the Harrow Core Strategy and Policy DM 9 and 10 of the Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
description: Details pursuant to conditions 5 (Construction Logistics Plan), 6 (levels), 7 (disposal of surface water and surface water attenuation) and 8 (disposal of sewage) attached to planning perission P/0308/19 dated 29/10/2020 for Redevelopment to provide part 5/part 6 storey building comprising of 40 flats (15 X 1bed, 19 X 2 bed and 6 X 3 bed); cycle and bin stores; parking (demolition of Synagogue)
